page.title: 13LUTON & DUNSTABLE HOSPITAL
page.content: The{Luton & Dunstable hospital}covers the areas of{Luton, Dunstable, {Leighton Buzzard}and all the other small villages. This is mainly known as South Bedfordshire. The hospital can have up to 750 patients but this ammount varies as sometimes parts of the building are closed for decoration.In the hospital there are many different departments. Some of the most important are intensive care,ENT,gynaecology and the{accident {service.}The hospital has 2150 staff with 70 junior doctors and 61 consultants. The hospital was actually built in 1939 but other parts have been added such as the Children's block, built in 1983. The area which the hospital covers is no less than 13 hectares.
